title: Aamchi Mess - College Mess Management App
description: This project was assigned to our group as part of our software engineering course. We chose this topic because we were facing daily problems related to the mess while living in the college hostel. For this project, we developed an Android application and followed the principles and best practices of software engineering. Our process involved requirement analysis, design and architecture, development, testing, and deployment. Working on this project provided us with valuable learning experiences. I had the opportunity to lead the team and mentor its members as I had knowledge about most of the technologies involved. I provided necessary training to my team members on Android Studio, Flask framework for the backend, and also introduced them to MongoDB. This project enhanced my skills in team building and leadership, and gave me a better understanding of how work is carried out in professional settings. Overall, it was a rewarding experience.
features: User-friendly interface for students to manage their mess subscriptions
Automated notifications for menu updates and payment reminders
Admin panel for mess management and tracking
REST API integration for seamless communication between frontend and backend
technologies: REST APIs for efficient data exchange
useCases: Enabling students to manage their meal plans efficiently
Providing mess admins with a streamlined system for managing orders
Reducing food waste through an optimized booking system
Introducing students to real-world mobile app development
